name: com.unity.vehicles
description:
Unity Vehicles aims to be a universal vehicle controller for ECS that covers a wide range of vehicle types and configurations. 

 Navigate to the "Samples" tab in order to download the vehicle samples, which can serve as a starting point for creating your own vehicles.

samples.description: Sample with the minimal vehicle setup.
Sample showcasing various vehicle types with camera, UI, obstacles and more.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
* Fixed vehicle wheels jitter when the vehicle rigidbody is set to not interpolated.
* Assigned default layer to floor object in the Advanced Vehicle Sample.
* Changed package samples to make them compatible across render pipelines.
